content: roya scarf is a knitted small scarf starting and ending with a triangle you can find suitable yarn at www querstricker de choose any fingering weight yarn you like approx 360 400 m follow me on instagram kalmknit for instagram use #royascarf #kalmknit this pattern is free but if you want to say thank you please create a project here on ravelry if you like to give me a little support for my next projects feel free to do this to my paypal account as a friend to s kalmbacher@online de enjoy the pattern
